create.success: You have successfully completed the NGO Hub application form. Confirmation of your application and a copy of the completed form have been sent to the e-mail address indicated. We will verify your application and contact you as soon as possible to complete the NGO Hub implementation process for your organisation.
create.success_helper: If you have any questions, you can contact us at:

user_agreement.title: User Agreement
user_agreement.list_item_1: The organization does not carry out activities and does not support causes of a political nature or that discriminate based on considerations related to ethnicity, race, sex, sexual orientation, religion, physical or mental capabilities or belonging to one or more social or economic categories;
user_agreement.list_item_2: The requested assistance is not intended for the development or implementation of one or more projects that could have a political or personal benefit, that violates Romanian or international legislation or that discriminates on grounds related to ethnicity, race, sex, sexual orientation, religion, physical abilities or psychological or belonging to one or more social or economic categories;

list_item_3.part_1: The organization has taken note and respects

user_agreement.list_item_4: The organization will mention the Code for Romania Association's contribution in its activity where appropriate;
user_agreement.list_item_5: The Code for Romania Association has the right to publicly mention the assistance provided to the organization;
user_agreement.list_item_6: The Code for Romania association reserves the right to restrict access to the NGO Hub of organizations that do not comply with the above conditions;
user_agreement.paragraph: Continuing the registration process represents the organization representative's declaration that the organization they represent meets the above eligibility criteria and agrees to the terms.
user_agreement.support_paragraph: If you have any questions, you can contact us at:
user_agreement.terms_and_agreement_paragraph: I have read all criteria mentioned above and I agree

agreement.required: To proceed, please read the agreement carefully and confirm that you agree.

financial.title: Financial Dates

modal.anaf: *the amount automatically taken from ANAF reporting
modal.income_report_information: This information will be public, be careful what you share.
modal.expense_report_information: This information will be public, be careful what you share.

common_config.maxim: Values greater than 9 digits cannot be entered.

membership.label: Income from contributions
membership.info: The total income from the contributions of the association members, if applicable to your NGO.

donations.label: Income from donations
donations.info: The total of individual donations you received in the previous year (either SMS or donation through crowdfunding platforms).

percent.label: Revenue from the redirection of 3.5% of income tax%
percent.info: The total income obtained through the 230 forms sent to your organization.

sponsorship.label: Sponsorship income
sponsorship.info: The total income from sponsorships received from companies or obtained through grants or other donations from legal entities.

economic.label: Income from economic activity
economic.info: The total income you obtained from service contracts, if applicable.

other.label: Other income
other.info: Enter here the total income obtained from other sources (for example, selling items at fairs).

financial.label: Financial income
financial.info: The total income resulting from financial operations, for example the interest you get on deposits or exchange rate differences.

net.label: Net salaries (human resources)
net.info: Your total expenses with the net salaries of your employees and contractors.

cas.label: CAS contributions (human resources)
cas.info: The total taxes you paid to the state.

economic.label: Direct expenditure from economic activity
economic.info: The total amount spent on service contracts.

administrative.label: Administrative expenditure
administrative.info: Your total expenses with rent, utilities and other services related to your headquarters.

transport.label: Transport and accommodation
transport.info: Total expenses with any type of transport and accommodation and per diem of your employees.

catering.label: Catering
catering.info: Total expenses made in the previous year with the catering consumed at events or on other occasions.

production.label: Production
production.info: Total expenses for producing your communication materials (for example stickers, roll-ups, flyers etc.).

software.label: Software services
software.info: Total expenses with subscriptions to applications you use (for example Mailchimp, Google Drive etc.).

advertising.label: Advertising and publicity
advertising.info: Total expenses of the organization on communication campaigns, for example Facebook Ads or LinkedIn Ads.

taxes.label: Other taxes
taxes.info: Total of any other taxes you paid in the previous year, for example VAT if applicable.

expense.label: Other expenses
expense.info: Enter here the total of any other expenses you have not entered in other segments of this budget (for example the purchase of a trailer for a caravan etc.).

details.contact: We will contact you within 24-48 hours.
details.active: The app is active for your organisation.
details.define_active: Lorem ipsum. What does it mean that the application is active. According to the needs of your NGO. A member of the Code for Romania team will contact you for further details as soon as possible on the contact e-mail mentioned in your organization profile. Thank you.
details.configure: This application must be installed and configured according to the needs of your NGO. A member of the Code for Romania team will contact you for further details as soon as possible on the contact e-mail mentioned in your organization profile. Thank you.
details.close_description: By confirming the removal of the app you will no longer be able to access the app from your organisation's NGO Hub account. The app will remain available in the My Apps tab where you can request it if you want to use it again.
